abstract.text: This project is based on the landscape character assessment of Nigeria, using machine learning and open-access geospatial dataset.

codecheck.summary:
The CODECHECK utilized the supplied dataset, but certain steps were omitted as they would take several hours to compute on the available hardware.
Despite this, the generated output aligns with the reported results.
However, it is not clear which output should be compared in the Python notebooks.

manifest.comment: These are the outputs that the author puts on the pre-registration. Please refer to the output section.
